main event: Ground observers at a baseball game in Detroit noted a bright metallic object in the sky, which was also confirmed by radar operators.
interesting points: The object displayed erratic flight characteristics and was tracked for approximately 20-3 minutes,The object's speed was reported as 6-10 mph,It changed color from blue to amber and remained amber,Two reports indicated a very short duration for the sighting, but radar data suggested otherwise.
witness description: Ground observers at a baseball game; radar operators
